function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Live-streamed online sessions may pose a risk of disease transmission if participants are not following hygiene guidelines","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 spreads easily and infected individuals may not show symptoms for 1-14 days.","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and risks.","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Industries producing essential health care products may still be at risk of infection spread due to close proximity of workers","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in testing techniques and accuracy of results","category":"Poor access to
